title: LeagueClient start and nothing
body: When it launch, the league of legend logo appears and disappears. In the task manager i see 3 times league client and all stop.

replies.body: The disappearing logo can be caused by either a crash in the background or overzealous security setting.  Restart your PC just in case!  You'll want to then run through each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore access and allow League to update.  Hit me up if you have any questions.
